abstracts.cdata!:
The Power Distribution Project will
            cover: (a) expansion of distribution in existing areas of
            supply; (b) provision of supplies to new areas not
            previously served; (c) improvement of existing facilities;
            (d) substitution of hydro-power for diesel power; and (e)
            foreign costs of engineering management assistance and
            training services.
